info.name: Veekun DARK
info.description: Veekun is the personal project of Alex Munroe and a comprehensive Pokedex. I made it dark.
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:
1.10 - Various major improvements:
* Skinned frontpage news blurbs
* Skinned all input, dropdown, and button dialogs
* Adapted themes for Conquest page
1.02 - Breeding icon hover fix [10/28/12]
1.01 - Stat bar fix [10/28/12]
1.00 - Initial release [10/28/12]
